original_solution_mapping.L1: If rice weighed 30 kg less than the green beans, then the total rice weight is 60 kg - 30 kg = 30 kg
original_solution_mapping.L2: If the green beans weighed 10 kg more than sugar, then the total sugar weight is 60 kg - 10 kg = <<60-10=50>>50 kg
original_solution_mapping.L3: When 1/3 weight of rice was lost, the weight loss became 1/3*30 = <<1/3*30=10>>10kg
original_solution_mapping.L4: The weight of rice after the loss is 30 kg - 10 kg = <<30-10=20>>20 kg.
original_solution_mapping.L5: When 1/5 weight of sugar was lost, the lost weight was 1/5 * 50 kg = <<1/5*50=10>>10 kg
original_solution_mapping.L6: The weight of sugar after the loss is 50 kg - 10 kg = <<50-10=40>>40 kg.
original_solution_mapping.L7: The total weight for all the items is 40 kg + 20 kg + 60 kg = <<40+20+60=120>>120 kg

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 3451.
    Returns: the total remaining weight of the stock.
    """
    # L1
    green_beans_weight = 60 # If the green beans weighed 60 kgs
    rice_less_than_beans = 30 # rice weighing 30 kg less than green beans
    rice_weight = green_beans_weight - rice_less_than_beans

    # L2
    beans_more_than_sugar = 10 # 10 kg more than sugar
    sugar_weight = green_beans_weight - beans_more_than_sugar

    # L3
    rice_loss_fraction = Fraction(1, 3) # 1/3 weight of the rice
    lost_rice_weight = rice_loss_fraction * rice_weight

    # L4
    remaining_rice_weight = rice_weight - lost_rice_weight

    # L5
    sugar_loss_fraction = Fraction(1, 5) # 1/5 weight of sugar
    lost_sugar_weight = sugar_loss_fraction * sugar_weight

    # L6
    remaining_sugar_weight = sugar_weight - lost_sugar_weight

    # L7
    total_remaining_stock_weight = remaining_sugar_weight + remaining_rice_weight + green_beans_weight

    # FA
    answer = total_remaining_stock_weight
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: If rice weighed {rice_less_than_beans} kg less than the green beans, then the total rice weight is {green_beans_weight} kg - {rice_less_than_beans} kg = {rice_weight} kg

If the green beans weighed {beans_more_than_sugar} kg more than sugar, then the total sugar weight is {green_beans_weight} kg - {beans_more_than_sugar} kg = <<{green_beans_weight}-{beans_more_than_sugar}={sugar_weight}>>{sugar_weight} kg
When {rice_loss_fraction} weight of rice was lost, the weight loss became {rice_loss_fraction}*{rice_weight} = <<{rice_loss_fraction}*{rice_weight}={lost_rice_weight}>>{lost_rice_weight}kg
The weight of rice after the loss is {rice_weight} kg - {lost_rice_weight} kg = <<{rice_weight}-{lost_rice_weight}={remaining_rice_weight}>>{remaining_rice_weight} kg.
When {sugar_loss_fraction} weight of sugar was lost, the lost weight was {sugar_loss_fraction} * {sugar_weight} kg = <<{sugar_loss_fraction}*{sugar_weight}={lost_sugar_weight}>>{lost_sugar_weight} kg
The weight of sugar after the loss is {sugar_weight} kg - {lost_sugar_weight} kg = <<{sugar_weight}-{lost_sugar_weight}={remaining_sugar_weight}>>{remaining_sugar_weight} kg.

The total weight for all the items is {remaining_sugar_weight} kg + {remaining_rice_weight} kg + {green_beans_weight} kg = <<{remaining_sugar_weight}+{remaining_rice_weight}+{green_beans_weight}={total_remaining_stock_weight}>>{total_remaining_stock_weight} kg
